data.title: The Juilliard School
data.meta_description: Founded in 1905, The Juilliard School is a world leader in performing arts education. Juilliard offers undergraduate and graduate degrees in dance, drama, and music.
data.text:
Whether you are just starting your research into Juilliard's undergraduate or graduate programs or are in the middle of submitting your application, we look forward to connecting with you. We encourage you to reach out to us, ask us questions, attend our events, and talk with your counselors and teachers. Wherever you decide to start, we'll be here for you along the way.

World-class performing arts courses, open to everyone online and in person!

Enrich, energize, and further your journey or career in dance, drama, and music at Juilliardâ€™s Lincoln Center campus, or online from the comfort of your home.
